thread.title: Amy Adams And Her Fantastic Cleavage Stole The Show At The Oscars
thread.title_full: Amy Adams And Her Fantastic Cleavage Stole The Show At The Oscars

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Amy Adams And Her Fantastic Cleavage Stole The Show At The Oscars
text:
We didn’t see Amy Adams until late into the Oscars ceremony tonight and she instantly stole the show with her fantastic cleavage as soon as she made her way on stage. 
a maior esnobada que respeitamos #Oscars 
teamo amy adams, no fundo do meu coração o Oscar é seu pic.twitter.com/CMP3BDFAF6 
— rubens (@doctorogers) February 27, 2017 
AmyAdams My heart ☹️ pic.twitter.com/uieFwqPQM8 
— عماد+ (@IS8ll) February 27, 2017 
Amy Adams, five-time Academy Award nominee and person who looks fucking amazing #Oscars pic.twitter.com/sjZHf7ilGu 
— Lauren Duca (@laurenduca) February 27, 2017 
Amy Adams❤️ #Oscars pic.twitter.com/0ixj3yMIXQ 
— ، (@ruidz_) February 27, 2017 


Ahhh Amy Adams looking sensational #Oscars pic.twitter.com/XJsROf6Eg6

pic.twitter.com/XKGfjQQxxR

What did I miss? Had Amy Adams on pause for the last 30 seconds. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/PZQ6KI5Xnt
